price: 213. Ee ha la baryin (caabudin) ilaah kale la jirka Alle si aadan uga mid noqon kuwa la cadaabayo.
arabic: فَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatakūna mina al-muʿadhabīna
